snippet.title: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem™ - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
💥 Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem™ is crashing onto PS4, PS5, Xbox X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC this October 18th! Packed with epic stunts and fan-favorite monster trucks in action! You can smash, crash, and perform mind-blowing tricks across fantastical arenas in this adrenaline-fueled arcade adventure!

Key Game Features:
• AUTHENTIC MONSTER TRUCK EXPERIENCE:  Drive and perform stunts with several fan-favorite Hot Wheels Monster Trucks™ 

• EXHILARATING STUNT ACTION:  Pull off spectacular tricks and discover each truck’s unique signature stunt move based on its personality.

• INTENSE BATTLE ARENAS:  Battle it out in electrifying arenas that include fan-favorites such as Stunt Zone By Night and the fearsome Skelesaurus's Lair. 

• BOSS FIGHTS AND ARCADE CHALLENGES:  Face off against formidable bosses in a variety of modes including Career, Stunt, Destruction, and Boss Mode!

• HEAD-TO-HEAD MULTIPLAYER:  Challenge your friends in competitive local multiplayer matches.

• EASY TO PICK UP, A BLAST TO MASTER:  Exciting gameplay designed for players of all ages.
